name: RemoveTagFromItem
description:
Remove a specified tag from an item on a Miro board.

Use this tool to remove a specific tag from an item on a Miro board. The tag will still exist on the board, but it will no longer be associated with the item. Note that changes will not reflect in real-time on the board unless refreshed.

parameters.name: tag_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the tag you want to remove from the item on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the tag that you want to remove from the item.

parameters.name: board_id_for_tag_removal
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which the tag will be removed from an item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board with the item that you want to remove a tag from.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item from which the tag will be removed.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to remove the tag from.
